feed.title: Combined summary - bip-genvbvoting : more complete specification up for review

entry.title: Combined summary - bip-genvbvoting : more complete specification up for review
entry.summary: The Bip-genvbvoting (generalized version bits voting) specification has been released for review on Github by its author. It aims to maintain full backward compatibility with the existing BIP9 state machine to ensure compatibility with ongoing deployments. The author plans to provide a link to a reference implementation once it is mature enough for review. The author expressed gratitude to previous reviewers who took a look at the initial rough draft of the proposal, and included a link to their comments. This proposal is open for comments from anyone interested in contributing to this area of development.
